isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1992-1993

geninfo.para: This service manual section contains information about the electronic engine control systems for the 9200/9300/9400 Series. This section is designed to complement the service and troubleshooting manuals released by the engine manufacturers. The engine manufacturers manuals include step-by-step instructions for diagnosis and repair.
Chapter I shows how the engine control circuit diagrams are arranged, explains symbols used on the diagrams, and describes how to locate components and connections.
Chapters II through V contain information needed to assist in troubleshooting the International installed circuits and components included in the subject engine control system.
